Logout.title: Logout
Logout.steps: You can logout using the button below. Doing so will end your current session.
Logout.impact: You'll need to login again next time you want to access your account. But in the meantime your account will be protected from access by anyone else with access to this device.

Onboarding.title: Let's get you set up
Onboarding.orgNumber: First, you need to go and find out the ID number of the company you want email alerts about. These are generally quite easy to find on Google. Just search for the word 'organisationsnummer' alongside the name of the company and it'll usually be among the top results.
Onboarding.invalidCode: A company ID is always six digits and four digits with a hyphen in between, like 000000-0000.

Hero.stopWorrying: Stop worrying how long since you last remembered to check. Start hearing about new documents as soon as they're filed.

Dashboard.title: Welcome Back
Dashboard.subscription: You're subscribed to email alerts for company ID {companyCode}. Email henry@catalinismith.com if you need to change to another company ID
